goals__remit: The London Metal Exchange(LME) is the global centre for industrial metals trading. The prices discovered on our three trading platforms are used as the global reference price and both the metal and investment communities use the LME to transfer or take on risk. LME Clear is the clearing house for the LME, designed and built in consultation with the LME’s members and launched on 22 September 2014. As a new entrant to the clearing space, LME Clear was EMIR-compliant from launch
